thread.title: Where and how to post custom Quake4 maps.

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Please use the Maps WIP and FINAL forum sections in the Doom3 technology category:

http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewforum.php?f=54
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewforum.php?f=55

Please use the prefix Q4 when posting a Quake4 map there, example:

Q4: bna_dm1

Thank you!

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
